name: Pocket Penguin: Physical Version
description:
Hi! Welcome to this page. 

This game is the demo that is enable for testing on Kickstarter. If you want to know everything, I recomend to visit the Kickstarter first.

Here's the link

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pocketpenguin/pocket-penguin-the-game-boy-c...

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Movement.

Z: Jump

X: Place Bomb

Enter: Start Button
